agents.name: Research Agent
agents.summary: AI research assistant using LangChain, Tavily, OpenRouter, FastAPI, Docker.
agents.description: The Research Agent is an intelligent assistant that helps you conduct comprehensive research on any topic. It searches multiple web sources, analyzes information, and provides detailed summaries with proper source citations. Results are also persisted into Google Sheets for easy retrieval and organization.
agents.architecture: Built on a microservices architecture using FastAPI for the backend API, LangChain for AI orchestration, Tavily for web search capabilities, and OpenRouter for access to multiple language models. The entire system is containerized with Docker for easy deployment and scaling. Integrated with Google Sheets for persistence of research results and query history. Designed for scalable, reliable, efficient operations.
agents.cost: Usage-based pricing: $0.005 per search query + $0.001 per 1K tokens processed. First 100 queries per month are free.
features: Google Sheets persistence for query history
Query Processing: Your question is analyzed and broken down into search components
Information Retrieval: Multiple web sources are searched and relevant content is extracted
Analysis & Synthesis: AI models analyze and synthesize information from all sources
Response Generation: A comprehensive, well-structured response is generated with source citations
use_cases: Organizing and retrieving past research queries from Google Sheets
